sentences.sContent: The old Dutch fort with its thick high walls looks virtually impregnable.
sentences.sCn: 该座荷兰老城堡城墙又高又厚，看上去固若金汤。

synos.tran: 无法攻取的；不受影响的；要塞坚固的；可以受孕的

remMethod.val: im (不) + pregn (拿住) + able → 无法拿下的 → 无法攻取的

trans.tranCn: 无法攻取的， 坚不可摧的
trans.tranOther: If you describe a building or other place as impregnable, you mean that it cannot be broken into or captured
